languages.text: "Веруешь ли ты в Бога-Императора, Защитника Человечества, пребывающего на святой Терре? Отвечай прямо и ясно, ибо перед тобой стоим мы — я, Его избранная служительница, а также — Вольный Торговец, помазанни{mf|к|ца} Его!"

"Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Protector of Mankind, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"
languages.original_text: "Веруешь ли ты в Бога-Императора, Защитника Человечества, пребывающего на святой Терре? Отвечай прямо и ясно, ибо перед тобой стоим мы — я, Его избранная служительница, а также — Вольный Торговец, помазанни{mf|к|ца} Его!"

traits.locale_text: "Do you believe in the God-Emperor, Mankind's Protector, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

"Do you believe in the God-Emperor, Mankind's Protector, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

"Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Guardian of Humanity, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

"Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Guardian of Humanity, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

"Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Protector of Mankind, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

languages.text: «¿Crees en el Dios Emperador, Protector de la Humanidad, que vive en la Sagrada Terra? Responde rápido y con claridad, pues te encuentras ante una de Sus siervas elegidas y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha sido ungid{mf|o|a} por Él».
languages.original_text: "Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Protector of Mankind, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Crees en el Dios Emperador, guardián de la Humanidad, que vive en la Sagrada Terra? Responde rápido y con claridad, pues te encuentras ante una de Sus siervas elegidas y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha sido ungid{mf|o|a} por Él».

languages.text: “你信仰居住在神圣泰拉的神皇，人类的守护者吗？请直截了当地回答我的问题，因为我就是祂选中的仆从，而这位行商浪人也得到了祂的赐福！”
languages.original_text: "Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Protector of Mankind, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

traits.locale_text: “你信仰居住在神圣泰拉的神皇，人类的守护者吗？请直截了当地回答我的问题，因为我就是祂选中的仆从，而这位行商浪人也得到了祂的赐福！”

languages.text: 「聖なる地球に住まう人類の守り人、神帝陛下を信じるか？率直にハッキリと答えろ。目の前にいるこの我は皇帝に選ばれし使者、そしてこちらの自由開拓者は、皇帝に選ばれたお方だ！」
languages.original_text: "Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Protector of Mankind, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる地球に住まう人類の守り人、神帝陛下を信じるか？率直にハッキリと答えろ。目の前にいるこの我は皇帝に選ばれし使者、そしてこちらの自由開拓者は、皇帝に選ばれたお方だ！」

languages.text: "Glaubt Ihr an den Gottimperator, den Beschützer der Menschheit, der auf dem Heiligen Terra lebt? Antwortet rundheraus und klar, denn ich stehe hier vor Euch als Seine auserwählte Dienerin, und {mf|dieser Freihändler|diese Freihändlerin} wurde von Ihm gesalbt!"
languages.original_text: "Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Protector of Mankind, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt Ihr an den Gottimperator, den Wächter der Menschheit, der auf dem Heiligen Terra lebt? Antwortet rundheraus und klar, denn ich stehe hier vor Euch als Seine auserwählte Dienerin, und {mf|dieser Freihändler|diese Freihändlerin} wurde von Ihm gesalbt!"

languages.text: « Croyez-vous en l'Empereur-Dieu, le Protecteur de l'Humanité qui réside sur la Sainte Terra ? Répondez franchement et clairement, car vous avez devant vous l'une de Ses servantes, aux côtés de {mf|ce libre-marchand|cette libre-marchande} qu'Il a Lui-même {mf|désigné|désignée} ! »
languages.original_text: "Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Protector of Mankind, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

traits.locale_text: « Croyez-vous en l'Empereur-Dieu, le gardien de l'humanité qui réside sur la Sainte Terra ? Répondez franchement et clairement, car vous avez devant vous l'une de Ses servantes, aux côtés de {mf|ce libre-marchand|cette libre-marchande} qu'Il a Lui-même {mf|désigné|désignée} ! »

languages.text: "İnsanlığın Koruyucusu, Kutsal Terra'yı mesken tutan Tanrı İmparator'a inanmıyor musun? Cevabını, lafı dolandırmadan ve açık yüreklilikle dile getir. Karşında O'nun yetkilendirdiği Hür Tacir ve efendimizin seçilmiş hizmetkârı olan ben varım!"
languages.original_text: "Do you believe in the God-Emperor, the Protector of Mankind, who dwells on Holy Terra? Make your answer forthright and clear, for I stand before you as His chosen servant, and this Rogue Trader has been anointed by Him!"

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlığın Koruyucusu, Kutsal Terra'yı mesken tutan Tanrı İmparator'a inanmıyor musun? Cevabını, lafı dolandırmadan ve açık yüreklilikle dile getir. Karşında O'nun yetkilendirdiği Hür Tacir ve efendimizin seçilmiş hizmetkârı olan ben varım!"
